snippet: Bill Cosby’s lawyers were aggressive enough to fend off rumors about his behavior for years. But the tactic may have backfired in the latest accusations against him.
abstract: Ten women who cannot sue Bill Cosby for sexual assault due to statute of limitations are instead suing him for defamation; legal experts say suits are backdoor for women to take him to court, but can be difficult cases to win.

byline.original: By SYDNEY EMBER and GRAHAM BOWLEY

lead_paragraph: Bill Cosby’s lawyers were aggressive enough to fend off rumors about his behavior for years. But the tactic may have backfired in the latest accusations against him.

headline.main: Defamation Suits Against Cosby Point to Peril of Belittling Accusers
headline.print_headline: Defamation Suits Against Cosby Point to Peril of Belittling Accusers
